history.proof: qsimpl time: 1. hauto use: succ_bottom, cA_B inv: sumbool.

ctx: intros m k x Hinv Hsucc.
assert (HcA: cA (B m k x) k x = (if eq_dart_dec x x then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) x then A m k x else cA m k x)).
exceptions.exn: The reference eq_dart_dec_refl was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros m k x Hinv Hsucc.
assert (HcA: cA (B m k x) k x = (if eq_dart_dec x x then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) x then A m k x else cA m k x)).
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "cA (B m k x) k x" in HcA.

ctx: intros m k x Hinv Hsucc.
assert (HcA: cA (B m k x) k x = (if eq_dart_dec x x then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) x then A m k x else cA m k x)).
apply (succ_bottom m k x Hinv Hsucc).
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap k : dim x : dart Hinv : inv_hmap m Hsucc : succ m k x s : succ (B m k x) k x Heqs : succ_dec (B m k x) k x = left s e : x = x Heqs0 : eq_dart_dec x x = left e HcA : A (B m k x) k x = bottom m k x Heq : A m k x = cA (B m k x) k x Unable to unify "A (B m k x) k x = bottom m k x" with "A m k x = bottom m k x".

original: intros m k x Hinv Hsucc. assert (HcA: cA (B m k x) k x = (if eq_dart_dec x x then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) x then A m k x else cA m k x)). { apply cA_B; auto. } simpl in HcA. rewrite eq_dart_dec_refl in HcA. intro Heq. rewrite <- Heq in HcA. apply (succ_bottom m k x Hinv Hsucc). symmetry. apply HcA.
